collector: site who provide supersaas service as part of own offering
text:
These other sites may place their own cookies or other files on your computer, collect data or solicit personal information from you.
We do not exercise control over the sites who provide SuperSaaS services as part of their own offering.
SuperSaaS processes personal information for the purposes described above, and in addition to the above we use the information to:
SuperSaaS processes personal information and appointment and booking data on our servers in the Netherlands and in other countries.
On some pages of the free service, Google AdSense uses cookies to serve these ads.

In order to provide our full range of services, we may collect the following types of information: SuperSaaS cookies -
We use cookies to improve the quality of our service by storing user preferences and tracking visitor trends.

In order to provide our full range of services, we may collect the following types of information: Log information - When you use SuperSaaS services, our servers automatically record information that your browser sends whenever you use a web application.

In order to provide our full range of services, we may collect the following types of information: Information you provide - When you sign up for a SuperSaaS account we ask you for personal information (such as your name, email address and an account password).
